metadata.title: CVE-2023-47235 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occurwhen a malformed BGP UPDATE message with an EOR is processed, because thepresence of EOR does not lead to a treat-as-withdraw outcome.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-47235` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2
frr-pythontools - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2
frr-snmp - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.2').
